case.title: Hairy Horny Hippie - 25 (East London)
case.text:
Fun hispanic hippie guy, slim, hairy but clean, ddf, can host
Looking for an equally open minded, flirtatiously fun femme fatale to engage in the carnal sins of the flesh.
Women of all shapes and sizes welcome - have been and love being with women over 30 especially. it's all about the free love. Let me treat you like the goddess or dirty girl you are. Open to all kinds of scenarios. Just hit me up with stats and a pic, and let's make this happen!
Love and peace on you all.
No men please, no timewasters.
